EmailTemplate.name: AIX.Ovation Collateral
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Collateral: Ovation Select
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for stopping by our booth. As requested, below is the collateral for Ovation Select:
Product Brochure <https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/honeywell3/images/Brochure-Ovation_Select.pdf> Customer Success Story - B777 AMAC <https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/honeywell3/images/CSS-B777_Ovation_Select.pdf> Customer Success Story - BBJ Jet Aviation Customer Success Story - BBJ Jet Tech <https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/honeywell3/images/CSS-Jet_Tech_BBJ.pdf> Carry On <https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/honeywell3/images/Ad-Carry_On.pdf>
